scripts.test: cross-env HTTPS_PORT=60443 PORT=60080 NODE_ENV=test NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --slow 500 --timeout 900000 -R mocha-teamcity-reporter ./test/**/*.js
scripts.testlocal: cross-env HTTPS_PORT=60443 PORT=60080 NODE_ENV=test NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 MONGO_TEST_DB=localtestdb ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --slow 500 --timeout 5000 -R spec ./test/**/*.js
scripts.basetest: cross-env HTTPS_PORT=60443 PORT=60080 NODE_ENV=test NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 MONGO_TEST_DB=localtestdb ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --slow 500 --timeout 5000 -R spec ./test/*.js ./test/utils/*.js
